text: idea: whole bunch of tablets tightly packed on the wall ideally with little or no bezel, each motorized in two dimensions
they could be in a mode where each one was oscillating randomly at different rates and different amounts
there could be a mode where you touched one and there was a ripple that went out from that one like you dropped a rock in a pond
they could show the company banner logo
when you touch one it could flip from part of the logo to a fun fact/insight about the company
